span.style: font-size: medium; background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 22px; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(0, 176, 80);

br.a: NEW - Instructional Plan for Students and Families

span.br: The school meal survey is now open. Please take time to fill out the survey so we can get an accurate count of meals. If you do not have internet access then please contact your child's school. Meals will be available for pick up this Tuesday and Thursday from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm for children age 1 to 18. Please contact your child's school should you have any questions.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

a.title: Grade Level Resources
a.strong: Additional grade level resources for students and families to utilize while we plan for instructional delivery for the remainder of the school year
